name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing and deploying microservices and scalable applications focused on performance optimization and automation. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, **Express**, and **Koa** for frontend and backend development. Expertise in **AWS** services including **Lambda**, **ECS**, **Fargate**, **API Gateway**, **S3**, and **CloudWatch**, as well as **CI/CD** processes and **Containers** for streamlined deployment. Strong skills in **SQL**, **Data Modelling**, and building **RESTful APIs** with a focus on both relational and non-relational datastores. Experienced in creating event-driven architectures and leveraging tools like **Terraform**, **AWS QuickSight**, **dbt**, **Athena**, **Glue**, and **Lake Formation** for data analysis and management. Committed to improving observability and implementing best practices in automated testing. An effective collaborator and project leader, successfully guiding teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
